Reviews.Title: “Excellent self catering accommodation in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Sandie66
Reviews.Content: clean apartment central madrid main sights reached foot apartment located close gran via notwithstanding central location apartment located street environment appeared safe day night juan welcoming despite language barrier managed requests kitchen equipped included washing machine sofa bed somewhat adequate teenage boys apartment airconditioned grocery shop located road convenient highly recommended

Reviews.Author: Sergey I

Reviews.Title: “Juan is fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Beverley S
Reviews.Content: nice centrally located wellequipped apartment wonderful juan met keys beginning stay incredibly helpful beyond expected hire car towed stay nice

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for seeing all the sights”
Reviews.Author: coupleCarlow
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights september enjoyed central taxi metro apartment clean modern short city trip airconditioned suitable children noisy especially weekends recommend couples enjoy museums sights prado 10 min walk meal la gracia de la montera doors amazing value 830pm dinner

Reviews.Title: “Great apartment in central location”
Reviews.Author: chylle
Reviews.Content: love apartment central location close sol gran via food shopping choices available convenience store nearby 2 minutes metro station owner friendly free bottle wine night spacious complete amenities free internet tv english couldnt definitely stay time
